interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: October Sky [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2018/10/25
Store: Jake Gyllenhaal  (Actor),     Laura Dern  (Actor),     Joe Johnston  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Drama
Product Description: ["Jake Gyllenhaal and Laura Dern star in October Sky, a touching and inspirational drama that's based on a true story. Working in the coal mines was an inescapable way of life in the small town of Coalwood, West Virginia in 1957. When high schooler Homer Hickam, Jr. (Gyllenhaal) sees the Sputnik satellite in the night sky, he dares to break free of the mines and reach for the stars. With the support of his teacher (Dern) and three friends, Homer sets out on an inspiring quest to build his own rocket. Overcoming a poor education, a tough father (Chris Cooper) and a series of misfires, Homer turns his dreams into reality in this incredible true story of hope, determination and triumph.", 'Bonus Content:', 'Aiming High: The Story of the Rocket Boys', 'Aiming High: The Story of the Rocket Boys', 'Spotlight on Location', 'Spotlight on Location', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Feature Commentary with Homer Hickam', 'Feature Commentary with Homer Hickam', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Drama', 'Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Chris Cooper, Charles Gordon, Chad Lindberg, Chris Owen, Chris Ellis, William Lee Scott, Larry Franco, Natalie Canerday, Elya Baskin, Lewis Colick, Joe Johnston, Jake Gyllenhaal, Laura DernChris Cooper, Charles Gordon, Chad Lindberg, Chris Owen, Chris Ellis, William Lee Scott, Larry Franco, Natalie Canerday, Elya Baskin, Lewis Colick, Joe Johnston, Jake Gyllenhaal, Laura Dern   See more', 'Initial release date': '2017-02-14', 'Language': 'English (DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1), Spanish (DTS 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '43379921', 'Director': 'Joe Johnston', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 14, 2017', 'Actors': 'Jake Gyllenhaal, Laura Dern, Chris Cooper, Chris Owen, William Lee Scott', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Producers': 'Charles Gordon, Larry Franco', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Lewis Colick', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Universal destroys yet another Blu-ray with horrible digital noise reduction and sharpening. Film grain has been completely wiped away to nonexistence, leaving a chalky, plasticky look which is extremely disappointing. Brilliant movie, horrible Blu-ray. It's unfortunate we'll never get another transfer for 1080p, but for for 4k they better change this destructive practice.
Review Title: DNRed to death
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

Amazing show, thanks Amazon
The Expanse: Season Two [DVD]
Shohreh Aghdashloo  (Actor),     Cas Anvar  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Television
['Hundreds of years in the future, humans have colonized the solar system. The U.N. controls Earth. Mars is an independent military power. The planets rely on the resources of the Asteroid Belt, where air and water are more precious than gold. For decades, tensions have been rising between these three places. Earth, Mars and the Belt are now on the brink of war. And all it will take is a single spark. Enjoy all 13 episodes of The Expanse: Season Two on back-to-back and uninterrupted.', 'Bonus Content:', 'Disc 1 - The Expanse Season Two:', 'The Expanse: Season 2 Trailer', 'The Expanse: Season 2 Trailer', 'The Expanse: Season 2 Preview', 'The Expanse: Season 2 Preview', 'A New Mission', 'A New Mission', '"Safe" Commentary with Show Runner/Executive Producer/Writer Naran Shankar, Executive Producer/Writer Mark Fergus, Director Breck Eisner, and Cast Members Steven Strait and Dominique Tipper', '"Safe" Commentary with Show Runner/Executive Producer/Writer Naran Shankar, Executive Producer/Writer Mark Fergus, Director Breck Eisner, and Cast Members Steven Strait and Dominique Tipper', '"Doors & Corners" Commentary with Supervising Producer/Writer Ty Franck, Supervising Producer/Writer Daniel Abraham, and Cast Member Cas Anvar', '"Doors & Corners" Commentary with Supervising Producer/Writer Ty Franck, Supervising Producer/Writer Daniel Abraham, and Cast Member Cas Anvar', 'Disc 2 - profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference**: Enjoys complex narratives featuring mature themes, including nudity, violence, and sexual content, with a strong interest in science fiction and fantasy genres. Recently engaged with inspirational dramas based on true stories, indicating a broadened appreciation for emotionally resonant narratives.
- **Quality Rating**: Consistently provides high ratings, especially for high-quality productions. However, critiques subpar transfers of classic films, highlighting a strong focus on visual quality and authenticity in media.
- **Language Versatility**: Prefers media offered in multiple audio languages, indicating an interest in diverse cultures and multilingual content.
- **Director and Production Quality**: Values work from established directors and producers; engages with critically acclaimed series and industry talent. Displays strong opinions on production quality, particularly regarding digital restoration practices.
- **Platform Preference**: Shows strong loyalty to Amazon Studios, frequently praising them for supporting quality productions and reviving popular shows.
- **Recent Behavior**: Actively engages with box sets of high-quality TV series and films, demonstrating a preference for immersive, binge-worthy content with intricate world-building. The latest interaction indicates a discerning palate that demands high visual fidelity and clear audio in film formats, reinforcing their commitment to quality storytelling.

The profile encapsulates a deep appreciation for high-caliber entertainment, with an emphasis on narrative richness, quality, and the contributions of skilled professionals.
